itunes:title: My Daughter's Friend is a Bad Influence
title: My Daughter's Friend is a Bad Influence
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: A mother believes that her 4-year-old’s best frie…
itunes:summary:
A mother believes that her 4-year-old’s best friend is a bad influence. She feels her daughter has adopted this friend’s behaviors and attitudes that are exclusionary and bullying towards other children. She wants to trust her daughter to choose her own friends but admits, “I really have come to dislike this child.”

Check out Janet's new audio series SESSIONS, her recorded consultations with parents discussing their most immediate and pressing concerns: SessionsAudio.com
